title: Expert Learning Experience Design in Complex Adaptive Organizations

context.prior_knowledge: Possession of basic scientific theories and practical experience in the field of science
context.additional_context: Expert Learning Experience Design Process Applying Complex Adaptive Systems Approaches in Smartphone-Centric Constrained Tech Environments

learning_goals: Learners can explain the core principles of complex adaptive systems (emergence, agency, social networks).
Learners can apply adaptive learning strategies to changing work scenarios in simulation/VR environments.
Learners can analyze learning experiences in fluid work environments within organizations using phenomenological analysis methods.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
